title: Cannot load into game
body:
started a blind draft alt tabbed at the end of the lobby and just waited for the game to pop up. 
Instead got hit with the reconnect screen.
this has happen over 2 days now resulting in me being pinged by leaver buster.
Is there a fix and can leaver buster be removed

replies.body: Hey guys If you are having the same problem, I just did a full repair and I can get into games again. Its at the top right screen between the X and -. Hope this works for you guys too!

I'm experiencing the same issue.  The cause in my case is my anti-virus has marked the game launcher as a mailware threat and removed it so once the countdown finishes the game fails to launch and the client displays reconnect.
if you couldnt even go to training tools or co-op game then you have the same problem as me. I already posted yesterday but so far there wasn't any help
